title: The music team keeps managing to outdo themselves
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WhwdSEvvFhQ

Seriously iconic and breathtaking. Dare I say this is a the best theme this year? Maybe one of the best in league? When you hear this and had to compare it blindly with a champ, Irelia would probably one of the most picked. It gives vibes of Mulan, a powerful warrior woman. It has chinese influences (which is what ionia is based heavily off of, ancient/old Chinese culture.) The only champion I think the track could sometimes be mistaken for is Karma (which is another strong ionian woman who has found new meaning to war.)

Overall just an amazing track that I think will stay iconic to Irelia for years to come.

Also gives me Kingdom Hearts vibes,  just me tho.

replies.body: Yeah.. They're the best in the game industry for sure.
I don't think they are exclusively Riot's music team. But yes, the music is awesome.
Yes, our composers are all Rioters.  We're very proud of them.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot cottonfxn,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=fpjiZmYE,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-03-19T17:19:53.675+0000)
>
> Yes, our composers are all Rioters.  We're very proud of them.

You should be. Go tell them that they're awesome! A lot of the tracks they've made are just so stupidly good or fitting that it's hard to even comprehend.
After Freljord,Warwick,Jhin and some other themes i didn't think i would ever hear a theme just as epic or better! i was wrong!
now if only the balance team could do as good a job as the art and sound team do
